response.original_title: Kuerz & Knackeg: Shortfilms made in Luxembourg VOL. 1
response.overview: LARS and CINEXTDOOR have put their heads together to present to you the first edition of KUERZ & KNACKEG: SHORT FILMS MADE IN LUXEMBOURG. From drama to documentary to thriller, we’ll be showing you a wide range of Luxembourgish short-film production since the early 1990s. On the VOL I program:  RACCROCHER by Marylène Andrin-Grotz (2025) TOUCH ME / WAS BLEIBT by Eileen Byrne (2018) ROGER by Geneviève Mersch (1996) EN DAG AM FRÄIEN by Govinda van Maele (2012) SNIPER by Pol Cruchten (1994) GLIMMEN / VANISHING by Ken Rischard (2022)  The films will be shown in their original Luxembourgish and German versions with English subtitles.
response.title: Kuerz & Knackeg: Shortfilms made in Luxembourg VOL. 1

results.name: Kuerz & Knackeg: Shortfilms made in Luxembourg Vol. I
